p.d: During rehearsals for an amateur singing festival Camille becomes the prime suspect for the event director's murder. The victim was killed in his hotel room, with her gun, and she had an appointment to meet him! Léa manages for them to be assigned the investigation, despite their closeness to Camille... Directed by: Stéphane Franchet (season 3, France, 2018) Screenplay: Thomas Boullé Cast: Astrid Veillon (Léa Soler), Stéphane Blancafort (Paul Marchal), Piérick Tournier (Erwan), Nelly Lawson (Camille), François Dominique Blin (Franck Marvaud), Sarah-Cheyenne (Alice), Guillemette Barioz (Sophie Vannier), Titouan Laporte (Thomas), David Marchal (Vauvert), Laetitia Rosier (Élodie Vidal), Héléna Vautrin (Tania Slimani), Martin Kamoun (Thibault Garric), Mehdi Abdelhakmi (Karim Slimani) Genre: detective
